cta.description: Simply. Choose a car. We will arrange a detailed inspection. Based on that you can decide whether you want the car. We then buy it, arrange an extended warranty, register it and deliver it to you.
cta.checkFirst: Check the car first, decide later
cta.title: Try out how Fast4Car works.

cta2.wantToCalculate: Want to Calculate Your Car Payment?
cta2.matchLenders: Match with up to 4 lenders to get the lowest rate available with no markups, no fees, and no obligations.
cta2.step1Title: Check the car first, decide later
cta2.step1Desc1: Before you commit, we'll arrange a thorough inspection and provide you with a detailed report on the car's technical condition.
cta2.step1Desc2: Only after reviewing the results do you decide if you want to proceed with the purchase.
cta2.step2Desc1: We're confident in the cars we sell, but for your peace of mind, every purchase comes with a 6-month warranty covering key components—engine, transmission, and differential—plus protection against hidden defects.
cta2.step2Desc2: If you're not satisfied, you can return the car within 14 days of receiving it
cta2.step3Desc1: Most vehicles can be delivered within 20 business days after your order is confirmed and payment is received.
cta2.step3Desc2: Please note: Delivery times may vary depending on the car's location and the administrative requirements in each country.

footer.discount: Get a 10% discount on your first car
footer.subscribeTitle: Subscribe to see secret deals prices drop the moment you sign up!

calculator.avoidIncreasedFinalPayment: Choose to avoid an increased final payment
calculator.workflowStep1Desc: Browse our extensive selection of over 1,000,000 verified vehicles across Europe, then click the 'Buy' button to get started.
calculator.workflowStep2Desc: Click the 'I'm interested in financing' option and fill out the short application. We'll handle the rest from there.
calculator.workflowStep3Desc: We'll forward your application to our lending partners and get back to you with personalized financing options.
calculator.competitiveLoanOffer: Get a competitive loan offer. Apply with us today. Unlock the best rates and terms for your car loan with our easy application process.
calculator.favourableFinancingDesc: Our favourable financing makes car buying accessible to everyone. Simply choose your favourite car and a financing plan that suits your needs.
calculator.save15OrMore: Save 15% or more when you book and drive before April 1st, 2025

about.headerSubtitle: Get the latest news, updates and tips
about.introParagraph: Welcome to Fast4Car, your trusted partner in car rentals. Since our founding, we have been committed to providing our customers with a seamless and reliable car rental experience. Whether you're planning a business trip, a family vacation, or just need a vehicle for everyday use, we offer a wide range of vehicles to meet your needs.
about.sellYourCar: Sell your car at a fair price. Get started with us today.
about.missionParagraph: Our mission is to make car rental easy, accessible, and affordable for everyone. We believe that renting a car should be a hassle-free experience, and we're dedicated to ensuring that every customer finds the perfect vehicle for their journey.
about.flexibleRentalOptions: Explore a wide range of flexible rental options to suit your needs
about.insuranceCoverage: Comprehensive insurance coverage for complete peace of mind
about.customerSupport: 24/7 customer support for assistance anytime, anywhere
about.clearPricingSupport: Fast4Car offers clear pricing and 24/7 great support.
about.commitmentParagraph: We are committed to offering transparent pricing with no hidden fees, comprehensive insurance options for peace of mind, and 24/7 customer support to assist you whenever you need it. At Fast4Car, your satisfaction is our top priority.

Include information on searching for destinations, selecting dates, choosing accommodation, and completing the booking process. Mention any special features or tools that can help users find the best deals.
about.stayAhead: Stay ahead with the latest car releases and upcoming events
about.noHiddenFeesDesc: The attention to detail in the booking process made our trip stress-free, allowing us to focus on creating lasting memories together.
about.mobileFriendlyDesc: Embarking on our dream vacation was made a breeze through the seamless coordination of items and hotels using this exceptional booking platform.
about.excellentCustomerServiceDesc: The overall process was not just efficient but also enriching, as the platform's intuitive design and user-friendly interface made every step enjoyable.
about.highlyFlexibleDesc: The attention to detail in the booking process made our trip stress-free, allowing us to focus on creating lasting memories together.

hero.title: How does Fast4Car work?
hero.description: Simply. Choose a car. We will arrange a detailed inspection. Based on that you can decide whether you want the car. We then buy it, arrange an extended warranty, register it and deliver it to you.

step1.title: Choose a car
step1.description: We process over 7 million ads every day, but we recommend only 10% of them for purchase. With the remaining cars, something often "doesn't fit" us.

step2.title: We check up the car
step2.description: We do not own cars in our offer, so we must first thoroughly check them. We know specific models and motorizations perfectly and we know what to focus on for each of them.

step3.title: Order and pay
step3.description: You can either pay for the car with your own money or use financing via Fast4Car. We have above-standard conditions agreed with many verified banks.

step4.title: We will provide a guarantee
step4.description: There's no risk to you when you buy a car on Fast4Car. We pride ourselves on transparency and the perfect condition of the cars.

step5.title: We buy out the car
step5.description: We purchase the car and deregister it in its country of origin. Each country has its own regulations.

step6.title: We deliver
step6.description: Whether we deliver the car directly to your doorstep or you pick it up at one of our pick-up points is entirely up to you.

guarantee1.title: Comprehensive Warranty
guarantee1.description: Every vehicle comes with our premium warranty package covering major mechanical components for complete peace of mind.

guarantee2.title: Quality Verified
guarantee2.description: Each car undergoes rigorous 150-point inspection by certified technicians to ensure top-tier quality and reliability.

guarantee3.title: Secure Transaction
guarantee3.description: Your purchase is protected with our secure payment system and transparent documentation process.

cta.title: Try out how Fast4Car works.
cta.description: Now all that's left is to choose your next car. We'll be delighted if it's from us.

reviews.title: Trustpilot Testimonials
reviews.subtitle: Read what our customers say about us on Trustpilot.

review1.text: It was nice experience with Anand, with hands-on experience and all

review2.text: I loved the way Alex took us on an Scrum journey, taking the time to talk about our experiences.

review3.text: Lorenz is an amazing tutor. He gave us a lot of examples and real-life case studies.
